name: stream-credit-zk-circuit
description: Zero-Knowledge Circuit for Credit Verification with Fraud Detection

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/creditCheck.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_12.ptau build/creditCheck_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/creditCheck_0000.zkey build/creditCheck_final.zkey --name='First contribution'
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/creditCheck_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.verify-proof: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
